alert.note: Alert for Clay (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Sioux Falls (Southeastern SD, Southwestern MN, and Northwestern IA)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 04 at 10:25AM CDT until April 06 at 1:00AM CDT by NWS Sioux Falls
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Iowa... South Dakota... Little Sioux River near Milford affecting Dickinson County. Little Sioux River at Spencer affecting Clay County. Willow Creek near Crooks affecting Minnehaha County. ...FLOOD WARNING FOR SNOWMELT NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL EARLY THURSDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Little Sioux River at Spencer. * WHEN...Until early Thursday morning. * IMPACTS...At 10.0 feet, the right bank overflows, and minor flooding of the Spencer city park and some rural agricultural areas begins. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:00 AM CDT Tuesday the stage was 10.0 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 9:00 AM CDT Tuesday was 10.1 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage just after midnight tonight and continue falling to 9.5 feet Sunday morning. - Flood stage is 10.0 feet. && Fld Observed Forecasts (1 pm CDT) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Wed Thu Fri Little Sioux River Spencer 10.0 10.0 Tue 9 am 9.9 9.8 9.7 &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued Wednesday afternoon at 1215 PM CDT.
